data.message: Create safety system maintenance scripts: Created 3 scripts: test-safety-gates.py (21 regression tests, all passing), verify-safety-system.py (startup self-check for hookify, rules, hook integrity, telemetry), restore-hooks.py (re-apply patched hooks from backup). All tested and committed.
